content: Consolidate Python docs: merge python.md, using-uv.md, and Python section from CLAUDE.md
Extract Rust/PyO3 content from main CLAUDE.md to docs/advanced/python-to-rust-migration.md
Update source-control.md to prefer GitHub CLI (gh) over JJ
Remove all duplicate content across configuration files
Reorganize main CLAUDE.md to under 100 lines with clear structure
Fix confusion between project and global CLAUDE.md files
